short_summary: Workplace Psychology Services for the Parliamentary Protective Service
description: Offer mandatory services that meet the specific requirements... The term of the contract is two years.
full_summary:
### Workplace Psychology Services
#### Solicitation Number: RFI-2023-24-002
#### Announcement Date: 2023-07-20

The Parliamentary Protective Service (PPS) is seeking information from qualified individuals or organizations to provide workplace psychology services that meet specific requirements.

### Request for Information Tender Description

The purpose of this Request for Information (RFI) is to gather information on seeking qualified providers of workplace psychology services. Our organization is committed to ensuring the well-being and productivity of its staff. Therefore, we are looking for information on experts who can provide services that promote psychological health and contribute to our mission.

### Required Skills and Expertise

We are seeking information on individuals or organizations that can provide expertise in:

* Health Care Provider Specialist Services (85121700)
* Educational Psychology Services (86132207)

Providers should possess the necessary qualifications, skills, and expertise to deliver services that meet the requirements outlined in the attached solicitation documents.

### Contact Information

For more information, please contact:

* Name: Sylvie Thibault
* Email: [proposals-soumissions@pps-spp.parl.gc.ca](mailto:proposals-soumissions@pps-spp.parl.gc.ca)
* Phone: (613) 295-0667

### Additional Resources

The attached documents provide further information on the requirements and the solicitation process.

* Amendment Amendment 1: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/7418/pps\_rfi\_2023-24-002\_amend-mod-001.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/7418/pps\_rfi\_2023-24-002\_amend-mod-001.pdf)
* Request for Information: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/7418/rfi-2023-24-002---workplace-psychology-services.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/7418/rfi-2023-24-002---workplace-psychology-services.pdf)

### Important Dates and Deadlines

* Tender Closing Date: 2023-09-22T14:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2023-11-01
* Expected Contract End Date: 2024-11-01
